Issue.creator: tongliofcary
Issue.summary: chaincode install returns invalid reference format error
Issue.description: ERRO 001 cannot get package for chaincode (firstchaincode:1.0)-err:open /var/hyperledger/production/chaincodes/firstchaincode.1.0: no such file or directory 2020-01-28 19:52:48.583 UTC dockercontroller buildImage -> ERRO 002 Error building image: invalid reference format 2020-01-28 19:52:48.583 UTC dockercontroller buildImage -> ERRO 003 Build Output: ******************** Step 1/4 : FROM hyperledger/fabric-baseos:amd64-$(BASE_VERSION)``` It will be extra nice if the error message be more specific. >
